revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Treatise of Beneficiary Matters: Or, a History of Ecclesiastical Benefices and Revenues. In which are set forth their rise and progress, and the various means by w..."
revision.text: Possibly: A Treatise of Beneficiary Matters: Or, a History of Ecclesiastical Benefices and Revenues. In which are set forth their rise and progress, and the various means by which they have accrued to the Church. By Father Paul, of the Order of the Servites, and Consulter of State to the Republick of Venice... (By Paolo Sarpi). (Westminster : Printed by J. Cluer and A. Campbell; for L. Stokoe, at the Bible and Key, near Coventry-Court, in the Hay-market; And sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster, 1727). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2410088~S1
